xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.title: Calendar Translations
xwikidoc.content:
xwiki.calendar.monthNames=['Enero', 'Febrero', 'Marzo', 'Abril','Mayo','Junio','Julio','Agosto','Septiembre','Octubre','Noviembre','Diciembre'] xwiki.calendar.monthNamesShort=['Ene','Feb','Mar','Abr','May','Jun','Jul','Ago','Sep','Oct','Nov','Dic'] xwiki.calendar.dayNames=['Lunes','Martes','Miércoles','Jueves','Viernes','Sabado','Domingo'] xwiki.calendar.dayNamesShort=['Lun','Mar','Mié','Jue','Vie','Sab','Dom']
xwiki.calendar.columnFormat.month=ddd xwiki.calendar.columnFormat.week=ddd D/M xwiki.calendar.columnFormat.day=dddd D/M
### Missing: xwiki.calendar.event.description=Description: ### Missing: xwiki.calendar.event.location=Location: ### Missing: xwiki.calendar.event.status=Status:
xwiki.calendar.titleFormat.month=MMMM YYYY xwiki.calendar.titleFormat.week=MMM D YYYY xwiki.calendar.titleFormat.day=dddd, D MMM, YYYY
xwiki.calendar.timeFormat=H\:mm xwiki.calendar.axisFormat=H\:mm
xwiki.calendar.allDayText=dia todo xwiki.calendar.button.today=hoy xwiki.calendar.button.day=dia xwiki.calendar.button.week=semana xwiki.calendar.button.month=mes
### Missing: xwiki.calendar.notification.inprogress=Saving... ### Missing: xwiki.calendar.notification.done=Saved ### Missing: xwiki.calendar.notification.error=Failed to save the document. Reason: update failed!
### Missing: rendering.macro.calendar.name=Calendar ### Missing: rendering.macro.calendar.description=Displays a Calendar ### Missing: rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.gApiKey.name=gApiKey ### Missing: rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.gApiKey.description=Key for the Google Calendar API. ### Missing: rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.gCal.name=gCal ### Missing: rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.gCal.description=Google calendar IDs separated by commas. ### Missing: rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.json.name=JSON ### Missing: rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.json.description=URL to a page generating JSON. This is only needed if the JSON generated by the Calendar.JSONService does not fit your needs. ### Missing: rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.updateurl.name=Update URL ### Missing: rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.updateurl.description=URL page to update events when they are moved or resized in the Calendar. The 'editable' parameter needs to be set to true for this field to be used. ### Missing: rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.classname.name=Classname ### Missing: rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.classname.description=Classname where the event objects are stored. The parameter is necessary unless a JSON service and and Update URL are provided ### Missing: rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.startfield.name=Start Field ### Missing: rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.startfield.description=Field in the object where the start date of the events are stored. The field needs to be a date field. The parameter is necessary unless a JSON service and and Update URL are provided ### Missing: rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.durationfield.name=Duration Field ### Missing: rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.durationfield.description=Field in the object where the duration of the events are stored. The field needs to be a date field. The parameter is necessary unless a JSON service and and Update URL are provided ### Missing: rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.editable.name=Editable ### Missing: rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.editable.description=Used to activate the edit feature allowing to move events ### Missing: rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.defaultView.name=Default View ### Missing: rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.defaultView.description=Default agenda to show on load of the agenda. Possible values are: month, agendaWeek, agendaDay, basicWeek, basicDay ### Missing: rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.year.name=Year ### Missing: rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.year.description=Year of the date to show when loading the calendar. Leave empty for today ### Missing: rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.month.name=Month ### Missing: rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.month.description=Month (from 0 to 11) of the date to show when loading the calendar. Leave empty for today ### Missing: rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.date.name=Day ### Missing: rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.date.description=Day (from 1 to 31) of the date to show when loading the calendar. Leave empty for today ### Missing: rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.firstDay.name=First Day ### Missing: rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.firstDay.description=First day (from 0 being Sunday to 6 being Monday) of the week to show in the calendar. Leave empty for Monday ### Missing: rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.firstHour.name=First Hour ### Missing: rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.firstHour.description=First hour to show in the calendar. Leave empty for default ### Missing: rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.minTime.name=Min Time ### Missing: rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.minTime.description=First time to show in the calendar. Users won't see hours before this time. Leave empty for default (8.00) ### Missing: rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.maxTime.name=Max Time ### Missing: rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.maxTime.description=Last time to show in the calendar. Users won't see hours after this time. Leave empty for default (23.00)
